Our knowledgeable team guides you through every available incentive and rebate program to maximize your return on investment. Join your environmentally conscious Easthampton neighbors in making the smart switch to clean, renewable solar energy.

faq.answer: Absolutely! Every system includes real-time monitoring through user-friendly smartphone apps. You can track energy production, consumption, and savings from anywhere. The system alerts you to any issues, and we remotely monitor all Easthampton installations to ensure optimal performance. Most homeowners love checking their solar production daily!

faq.question: What happens when my Easthampton solar system produces excess energy?
faq.answer: Massachusetts offers excellent net metering policies. When your Easthampton solar panels produce more electricity than you consume, the excess flows to the grid and you receive full retail rate credits on your Eversource bill. These credits roll forward month-to-month, allowing summer overproduction to offset winter usage.
